alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Stark County through 800 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Navarre, or 10 miles southwest of Canton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, Massillon, Louisville, Minerva, Brewster, Navarre, Waynesburg, East Sparta, East Canton, Beach City, Bolivar, Meyers Lake, Robertsville and Perry Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
